basics.name: Woosong Kang
basics.label: Robotics Engineer
basics.summary: A Korean-born robotics engieer, particularly interested in legged robot locomotion

work.name: Korea Institue of Machinery and Materials(KIMM)
work.summary: Participated in the development and control of a dual-arm robot, manipulator robot and a wheeled-bipedal robot as a full-time researcher

work.name: Daegu Gyeongbuk Institue of Science and Technology(DGIST)
work.summary: Proposed new control algorithms for achieving high-speed running with estimated ground reaction forces

education.institution: Daegu Gyeongbuk Institue of Science and Technology(DGIST)
courses: Development and Control of High Driving-Force Quadruped Robot

education.institution: Daegu Gyeongbuk Institue of Science and Technology(DGIST)

publications.name: Iterative Periodic Running Control through Swept Angle Adjustment with Modified SLIP Model
publications.summary: This paper presents a periodic running control strategy based on a modified Spring-Loaded Inverted Pendulum (SLIP) model to achieve stable running at various velocities. This model simplifies the analytical representation of the stance phase and defines the required swept angle for maintaining periodic motion during the flight phase. Using this model, we develop a feedback control system that ensures the stability of QLSLIP-based periodic locomotion, even in the presence of external disturbances.

publications.name: Developing a Jumping Algorithm for Overcoming Obstacle in the Wheeled Bipedal Robot
publications.publisher: Journal of the Korean Society of Manufacturing Technology Engineers
publications.summary: Using the dynamics of the SLIP model, the take-off velocity and leg length trajectories needed to achieve the desired height were determined. The robot's kinematics were then controlled to mimic the SLIP model, allowing it to track position and velocity trajectories and jump to the desired height.

publications.name: Development of Rotating Workspace Ground Contact Force Observer for Legged Robot
publications.publisher: 2021 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS)
publications.summary: Two novel coordinate systems are introduced to describe the joint space motion and the workspace differently, and the ground contact force observer is designed in the novel coordinate systems.

publications.name: Implementation of Integrated Dual SLIP Dynamics for Sagittal plane motion of Quadruped Robot
publications.publisher: International Conference on Control, Automation and Systems (ICCAS)
publications.summary: A novel control algorithm is proposed to achieveSLIP dynamics by preventing the legsâ€™ asymmetry SLIP behavior.

publications.name: Ripple Minimization for Harmonic-geared Series Elastic Actuator under Force Control
publications.publisher: 2020 IEEE 16th International Workshop on Advanced Motion Control (AMC)
publications.summary: Develops an accurate force control algorithm an reduce the effect of torque ripple for the Series Elastic Actuators (SEA).

publications.name: Ripple Minimization for Harmonic-geared Series Elastic Actuator under Force Control
publications.publisher: 2020 IEEE 16th International Workshop on Advanced Motion Control (AMC)
publications.summary: Develops an accurate force control algorithm an reduce the effect of torque ripple for the Series Elastic Actuators (SEA).

publications.name: Transparent Torque Sensor-less Impedance Rendering for Low-cost Direct Drive Motor
publications.publisher: 2020 IEEE 16th International Workshop on Advanced Motion Control (AMC)
publications.summary: proposes transparent sensor-less impedance control to improve impedance rendering performance for the low-cost DD motor. Torque ripple, the main problem, is measured and analyzed to develop the high-performance impedance controller.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
